name: Ghoul
description: A feral undead creature with elongated claws and teeth. Its skin is stretched tight over bones, and its eyes gleam with unholy hunger. The stench of the grave follows it.
combat_notes: Attacks with paralyzing claws and bite - three attacks per round. A successful claw or bite attack can paralyze the victim, leaving them helpless. Particularly dangerous in confined spaces where escape is difficult.
